content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore, and my inventory now contains:
# - 2 stone furnaces
# - 12 wood
# - 10 iron ore

# Step 4: Smelt iron ore into iron plates
# Now, I will use the stone furnaces to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. 
# I will need to ensure I have enough fuel for the furnaces, so I will use some wood as fuel.

# First, I will check my inventory for wood to use as fuel:
assert inspect_inventory()[Prototype.Wood] >= 1, "Not enough wood to fuel the stone furnace"

# Place the stone furnaces and start smelting iron ore
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=2)  # Place the furnaces
smelt_resource(Prototype.IronOre, quantity=10, into=Prototype.IronPlate)  # Smelt iron ore into iron plates
print(f"Smelting started. Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
